summary: Diff implements several stability and palette updates (sky-blue accent utilities, countdown clamping, chart/RSI guards, static hero background reference), but evidence also shows addition/expansion of unrelated “Golumanji” game features and Spanish-only UI text in new/modified game components; code-horse asset integration is not evidenced in the provided hero diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Launch hero must render both the background texture and the “horse made of light/code” image from static `/assets/generated/*` with no missing-asset console errors.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock` clearly references the background texture image, but no reference to the required code-horse image is shown in the provided truncated content, so implementation cannot be verified from evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: User-facing strings touched by these fixes must be English-first and follow the existing translation approach (LanguageContext keys or consistent English literals), avoiding Spanish-only hardcoded strings.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates Spanish-language UI/dialogue was introduced/exists in multiple modified game-related components, which conflicts with the English-first constraint for touched strings.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for `frontend/src/components/GameHUD.tsx` and `frontend/src/components/Comecoco.tsx` mention Spanish dialogue/interface)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded an entire “Golumanji” game flow (main menu, character selection, mission briefing including new Chapter 7, 3D game world, HUD with dialogue, and a Pac-Man-like mini-game).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is stabilization, palette unification, calculation correctness, and hero asset regressions; it explicitly lists “Adding new features beyond stabilization...” as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/changed SEO metadata and structured data in `index.html`.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; scope is frontend palette/calculation/hero asset regressions and general runtime/layout stability, not SEO work.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed React Query backend integration hooks including user profile management and backend health check.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-18..22; appears to be additional functionality beyond the stated stabilization targets.
